snippet: The Islamic State advanced against rival insurgents on Sunday and captured a town and two villages that are close to a crossing with Turkey.
abstract: Islamic State makes gains in northern Syria, capturing two villages and Turkish border town of Soran Azaz; advance could threaten efforts by rival insurgents, since Azaz sits on important weapons supply route between Turkey and Aleppo.
lead_paragraph: The Islamic State advanced against rival insurgents on Sunday and captured a town and two villages that are close to a crossing with Turkey.

headline.main: ISIS Gains Syrian Area Near Border
headline.print_headline: ISIS Gains Syrian Area Near Border

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
